title: Chat Buster Feature
body: I am just so sad because of the chat buster feature i dont leave the games , it just gets that attempting to reconnect and just because of that i have got a before game penalty of 20 mins per match...please change this feature.

replies.body:
If you're continuously disconnecting from matches, you're leaving your teammates short a player, which really sucks for them. The [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system only takes action with 20-minute low priority queues after there's a trend of disconnections on your account. Because these disconnections negatively impact everyone in the match, regardless of the reason for the disconnection, the system treats all disconnections equally. This is a key reason why these penalties cannot be removed or modified.

It sounds like your connection is unstable to the server, for which I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address. Let me know if these steps helped.
